course_description: Prerequisites: Chemistry, undergraduate biology, and permission of instructor. Provides a graduate-level introduction to human nutrition and disease, at both the clinical and research levels, and an understanding of the experimental bases for current clinical nutritional practice. Cross-listed with IBS 581.
schedule_location: MW 8:30am-9:50am in Grace Crum Rollins TBA
